name: CLOUDFOAM ADAPT 2.0 SLIP ON SNEAKER
description: Take on the day in the Cloudfoam Adapt 2 Slip On Sneaker from adidas.
1. Breathable mesh upper in a slip on sneaker style with a round toe
2. Slip on entry with decorative midfoot lacing
3. Bootie construction for a sock-like fit
4. Heel and tongue pull tabs
5. Smooth lining with Cloudfoam cushioned comfort footbed
6. Durable rubber traction outsole

name: RESPONSE SR RUNNING SHOE
description: Keep up the pace in the Men's adidas Response SR Running Shoe.
1. Mesh upper in a running sneaker style with a round toe
2. Lace-up closure
3. Padded collar and tongue for increased comfort
4. Response Foam midsole and Adibouncy EVA sockliner
5. Durable rubber outsole

name: AIR MAX EXCEE SNEAKER
description: A new twist on an iconic look:the Men's Nike Air Max Excee Sneaker.
1. Mesh, leather, and suede upper in a lifestyle sneaker style
2. Slip on entry with lace-up closure
3. Padded collar and tongue for increased comfort
4. Synthetic leather overlays
5. Soft lining with cushioned insole
6. Foam midsole with durable rubber outsole
7. Visible Air unit

name: MAMBA FURY BASKETBALL SHOE
description: Named for a raw emotion that defined Kobe Bryant's legendary game: the Nike Mamba Fury Basketball Shoe.
1. Mesh upper in a high-top basketball sneaker style with a round toe
2. Lace-up closure
3. Padded collar and tongue for increased comfort
4. Tongue pull tab
5. Low-top design is sleek and lightweight, providing support without sacrificing agility
6. Nike Zoom Air cushioning under the ball of your foot helps deliver a burst of responsive energy generated by your own force
7. TPU heel clip
8. Durable rubber outsole

name: LEBRON WITNESS IV BASKETBALL SHOE
description: Take superstar LeBron James' court style with you in the Men's Nike Lebron Witness IV Basketball Shoe.
1. Breathable mesh and synthetic upper in an athletic basketball shoe style with a round toe
2. Lace up entry
3. Tongue pull tab
4. Collar provides a snug fit
5. Targeted featherposite zones for ankle support and stability
6. Soft fabric lining with a cushioned comfort insole
7. Durable rubber traction outsole

name: AXELION WIDE RUNNING SHOE
description: Breathable construction keeps you comfortable in the Men's Axelion Wide Running Shoe from Puma.
1. Breathable knit fabric upper in a running shoe style with a round toe
2. Lace up entry for a secure fit
3. Cushioned collar and tongue for increased comfort
4. Locked down feel with midfoot support
5. Logo band across heel
6. Fabric lining with SoftFoam cushioned comfort footbed
7. Foam midsole for all day support
8. Durable carbon rubber traction outsole
9. Available in wide sizes

name: REGULATE RUNNING SHOE
description: Add order to you run with the Regulate Running Shoe from Puma.
1. Breathable mesh or synthetic leather upper in a running shoe style with a round toe
2. Lace up closure locked down with tabs
3. Padded collar and tongue for added comfort
4. Logo embossed overlay for support
5. Smooth lining with cell comfort cushioning technology
6. Rubber traction outsole

name: DOHENY LOW TOP SNEAKER
description: A go to look any day; the Doheny Skate Shoe from Vans.
1. Canvas upper in a skate shoe style with a round toe
2. Lace up entry
3. Cushioned collar and tongue
4. Logo details
5. Soft lining with cushioned comfort footbed
6. EVA memory foam midsole
7. Vulcanized durable rubber traction outsole

name: WARD HIGH TOP SNEAKER
description: Get an old-school skate look with the Ward High Top Sneaker from Vans.
